metadata.title: CVE-2019-3806 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
An issue has been found in PowerDNS Recursor versions after 4.1.3 before 4.1.9 where Lua hooks are not properly applied to queries received over TCP in some specific combination of settings, possibly bypassing security policies enforced using Lua.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-3806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdns-recursor - 4.1.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.9-1').
